sentences: On 24 September 2007, a special session of the UN General Assembly was held at UN headquarters, entitled The Future in Our Hands: Addressing the Leadership Challenge of Climate Change.
The meeting was attended by 80 Heads of State or Government, and representatives from 150 countries.
Participants emphasized, inter alia : halving emissions by 2050; limiting the temperature increase to 2 C; and making deep emissions reductions in developed countries.
